thread.title: Whether Greece votes yes or no, the euro cannot survive in its current form
thread.title_full: Whether Greece votes yes or no, the euro cannot survive in its current form

author: Allister Heath
title: Whether Greece votes yes or no, the euro cannot survive in its current form
text: Economics Whether Greece votes yes or no, the euro cannot survive in its current form Best case scenario? The EU will undergo years of painful convulsions, precipitating a new treaty that imposes greater centralisation and restrictions on the fiscal independence of nation states If the Greek people vote No, it's game over for Greece's membership of the single currency Photo: Reuters
